results.description: The Kenya Breast Cancer Study utilizes molecular and genomic approaches to study breast tumors and tumor microenvironment, among African women. This study aims to improve understanding of breast cancer risk factors and corresponding clinical outcomes in this population.
results.title: Kenya Breast Cancer Study - National Cancer Institute

results.description: The Risk Factor Heterogeneity in Breast Cancer Study aims to investigate the complex relationship between breast cancer risk factors, like mammographic density and terminal ductal lobular units (TDLU) involution, and clinical features, like breast cancer intrinsic and immune subtypes and outcomes.
results.title: Risk Factor Heterogeneity in Breast Cancer - National Cancer Institute

results.description: Studies to evaluate the possible role of occupational and environmental factors in the origin of breast cancer
results.title: Breast Cancer and Occupational and Environmental Exposures - National Cancer Institute

results.description: Study of chronic hepatitis virus infection and the risk of liver cancer
results.title: Hepatitis Viruses and Liver Cancer - National Cancer Institute

results.description: The Hong Kong Breast Cancer Genomics Study aims to characterize the genomic and molecular profiles of breast cancer tumors and adjacent normal tissue collected from Chinese breast cancer patients in Hong Kong.
results.title: Hong Kong Breast Cancer Genomics Study - National Cancer Institute

results.description: DCEG researchers conduct studies on breast cancer, a cancer that usually forms in the breast ducts (tubes that carry milk to the nipple) and lobules (glands that make milk). Breast cancer occurs in both men and women, although male breast cancer is rare.
results.title: DCEG researchers conduct studies on female and male breast cancer - National Cancer Institute

results.description: A study of anal cancer risk in HIV-positive men who have sex with men
results.title: Anal Precancer and Cancer in HIV-Positive Men (Anal Cancer Screening Study) - National Cancer Institute

results.description: The Confluence project will develop a large research resource by 2021 to uncover breast cancer genetics through genome-wide association studies.
results.title: Confluence project for breast cancer genetics - National Cancer Institute

results.description: A liver cancer pooling project among existing U.S. cohorts in order to explore liver cancer etiology in a prospective manner
results.title: Liver Cancer Pooling Project - National Cancer Institute

results.description: A study evaluating the role of testicular microlithiasis in familial testicular cancer
results.title: Familial Testicular Cancer Study - National Cancer Institute
